issue.title: [Archery][Integration] Fix decimal case generation in write_js_test_json
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12776](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12776). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The integration build has started to fail on master: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/2575265526#step:9:4265

I don't entirely understand the reason why we see this error, in order to call that function we would need to pass `--write_generated_json` to the archery command, but we don't. The implementation is clearly wrong though.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12776?focusedCommentId=17344530) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10314
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10314>
